text: The 2009 All Thailand Golf Tour is the 11th season of the All Thailand Golf Tour, the main professional golf tour in Thailand since it was established in 1999. ==Tournament results== The table below shows the 2009 schedule. {| class="wikitable" style="font-size:95%" !Date !! Tournament !! Location !! Prize money men (฿) !! Prize money women (฿) !! Men's winner !! Women's winner |- | 1 Feb || Singha Masters || Santiburi Country Club Chiang Rai || align=right|2,000,000 || align=right|100,000 || Thammanoon Sriroj || Nontaya Srisawang |- | 5 Apr || Singha Pattaya Open || Burapha Golf Club (C-D) || align=right|1,500,000 || align=center|– || Kiradech Aphibarnrat || align=center|– |- | 5 Jul || Singha Classic || Bangpakong Riverside Country Club || align=right|1,500,000 || align=right|100,000 || Thammanoon Sriroj || Patcharajutar Kongkraphan |- | 19 Sep || B-Ing TPC Championships || Bangpra Golf Club || align=right|1,500,000 || align=center|– || Namchok Tantipokhakul || align=center|– |- | 20 Dec || Singha Championship || Royal Hills Golf Resort & Spa || align=right|1,500,000 || align=right|100,000 || Prayad Marksaeng || Patcharajutar Kongkraphan |} ==References== Category:All Thailand Golf Tour All Thailand Golf Tour
title: 2009 All Thailand Golf Tour
